description: This source file implements utility functions for the Slap Object Container component within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It defines a function to create a new object container, specifically the function SlapCreateObjContainer which calls an internal creation function.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapCreateObjContainer(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates a new Slap Object Container object by invoking the internal creation function SlapOcoCreate with provided context handles.
